dct_title_s: Descrittione della Palestina o della Terra Santa
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map give in "Leuce", "Mil germanica", "Stadia", and "Mil italica".
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text throughout and at bottom: La Palestina particolar...
Appears in Ptolemaeus, Claudius, Geographia, Venezia Giovanni Battista & Giorgio Galignani, 1598.
